I have been exposed to computers and technology from an early age and started programming at age 11 with Scratch and HSP (Hot Soup Processor). I can't say that I am pretty good at programming, but I developed a Discord bot in Python and created my own website using HTML and CSS.
I also draw pictures 🖼️, create music 🎵, and create videos🎥. I am still a beginner in all of these, but I am more interested in technology than most people. I am not in college yet, but I hope to work in technology in the future!
